experience.title: Data Scientist | HR Recruitement
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Developed a state-of-the-art AI-based HR recruitment model, recruiting applicants on video responses to a set of questions. ‚Ä¢ Reconstructed research work on feature extraction and exploiting temporal dynamics of video data to capture video dynamics.‚Ä¢ Two different output layers - eight output softmax layer corresponding to the number of expressions present in the CK+ training set, used for emotion classification on small datasets. For regression task with data from Aff-Wild2 dataset, the dense layer with two units for predicting valence and arousal were used.‚Ä¢ Obtained 95% accuracy on test CK+ dataset and 50% accoracy on the JAFEE dataset.
experience.description_html: ‚Ä¢ Developed a state-of-the-art AI-based HR recruitment model, recruiting applicants on video responses to a set of questions. ‚Ä¢ Reconstructed research work on feature extraction and exploiting temporal dynamics of video data to capture video dynamics.‚Ä¢ Two different output layers - eight output softmax layer corresponding to the number of expressions present in the CK+ training set, used for emotion classification on small datasets. For regression task with data from Aff-Wild2 dataset, the dense layer with two units for predicting valence and arousal were used.‚Ä¢ Obtained 95% accuracy on test CK+ dataset and 50% accoracy on the JAFEE dataset.

experience.title: Open Domain Chat-Bot | NLP Intern | AIEdge Technologies Private Limited
experience.description: ‚Ä¢ Reviewed the newly proposed Open Domain ChatBot Blender by Facebook, to address the problem of loss of context.‚Ä¢ Analyzed the Model Architectures, Decoding, Evaluation and Generative Methods and the Training data used in the Bot.‚Ä¢ Followed research papers on the State of the art models: Transformers, Encoders, Bi-Polyencoders and Crossencoders.‚Ä¢ Proposed an Intent Classifier Bi-lstm NN to keep track of the conversation and Similarity Models for output comparison.
